    Create a new account invitation for the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `account-invitation:write`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["email"],"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"maxLength":250,"minLength":1,"type":"string","description":"Email address of user being invited to the account","format":"email","example":"john.smith@example.com"},"role":{"maxLength":50,"type":"string","description":"Role to be assigned when the invitation is accepted","nullable":true,"example":"admin"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"CreateAccountInvitationRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
